sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-card :img-src="show.image ? show.image.medium : ''" :img-alt="show.name" class="mb-3">
    <b-card-title>{{ show.name }}</b-card-title>
    <b-card-text>Rating: {{ show.rating.average }}</b-card-text>
    <b-button :to="{ name: 'show-detail', params: { id: show.id } }" variant="primary">
      View Details
    </b-button>
  </b-card>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    show: Object,
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.show-card {
  margin: 1em;
  padding: 1em;
  background: #f5f5f5;
  border-radius: 8px;
  text-align: center;
}
</style>
